DOC.detailed_description: Functional dyspepsia ( FD ) functional gastrointestinal disorder without structural lesion . FD claim affect 25 % population South Korea . Although conventional approach base current evidence proton pump inhibitor prokinetic agent use , many FD patient turn traditional Korean Medicine treatment largely due lack satisfactory effect treatment . Acupuncture treatment , one seek therapeutic modality traditional Korean Medicine , commonly use gastrointestinal disorder Korea . However , effect acupuncture FD rigorously evaluate . In present study , investigate whether 8 session acupuncture treatment 4 week , comparison acupuncture treatment , i.e . waitlist-control , improve symptom FD . Outcome measure include proportion responder , Korean version Nepean Dyspepsia Index , EuroQol-5 Dimension , Functional Dyspepsia-Related Quality Life , Beck 's Depression Inventory , State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ghrelin hormone . Genome-wide association study ( GWAS ) also conduct elucidate possible difference genotype responder non-responders acupuncture treatment .
